channel.title: CVE Feed for BigProf -- Online Clinic Management System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BigProf -- Online Clinic Management System

item.title: CVE-2023-6425|2024-08-02T08:28:21.769Z -- bigprof -- online%20clinic%20management%20system
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in BigProf Online Clinic Management System 2.2, which does not sufficiently encode user-controlled input, resulting in persistent XSS through /clinic/medical_records_view.php, in the FirstRecord parameter. Exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacking user to store dangerous JavaScript payloads on the system that will be triggered when the page loads.

item.title: CVE-2023-6424|2024-08-02T08:28:21.840Z -- bigprof -- online%20clinic%20management%20system
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in BigProf Online Clinic Management System 2.2, which does not sufficiently encode user-controlled input, resulting in persistent XSS through /clinic/disease_symptoms_view.php, in the FirstRecord parameter. item.title: CVE-2023-6422|2024-08-02T08:28:21.807Z -- bigprof -- online%20clinic%20management%20system
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in BigProf Online Clinic Management System 2.2, which does not sufficiently encode user-controlled input, resulting in persistent XSS through /clinic/patients_view.php, in the FirstRecord parameter.
